We’ll be planting more outdoor classrooms like these across the globe, so stay tuned for more.

caption:
Two years ago, we launched The Tree Dasher, our first-ever running shoe made with eucalyptus tree fiber and other planet-friendly materials. It was everything we dreamed it would be. Comfortable. Sleek. Tough on the road and easy on the environment. A true win-win. We took a moment to celebrate, and then turned right back around to ask ourselves (and you!)… “what’s next?” What if it could have better spring? Less weight? More grip? And an even lower carbon footprint? 

Our answer: The Tree Dasher 2 – the next evolution in natural running. Made with a mix of sustainable materials, this everyday running shoe softens landings, smoothes transitions, and continuously delivers comfort, stride after stride.

caption:
So what exactly is a carbon footprint? It's the amount of carbon dioxide equivalent that a product or activity releases into the atmosphere. 

How do we calculate it? We factor in everything— from materials sourced to end of product life—and from that we are able to assign each and every one of our products a carbon footprint. Our numbers keep you informed and ourselves accountable. 

Even though we are 100% carbon neutral now, we know there’s always room for improvement, which is why our Flight Plan outlines our game plan to reduce our carbon footprint to near zero by 2030. 

Check out our stories for a deeper dive into our Flight Plan and what makes up a carbon footprint. #TreadLighter
